entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect list patttern formatting #45363
  • .NET 9 AppCrash when published in release configuration, x86 #45349

Closed

  • GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined error in dotnet SDK when installed via snap #40272
  • NuGet config file name inconsistent when accessing via WSL UNC paths #45357
  • dotnet tool update did not install the latest version #43089

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45364
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary architecture parameter in vmr-build.yml #45361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Ubuntu non dev versions leg from validation stage #45360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unified Build publishing #45359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check how often each command resolver is used #45356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build the .NET SDK installer using the ASP.NET Core Runtime MSI instead of the wixlib #45346
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Review for breaking changes, breaking-change, Area-CLI, Area-VS, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix BuildPass>1 artifacts and asset manifest content #45323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump MSTest templates to 3.6.4 #45278
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • Add mstest dependency #45322
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • VMR: Temporarily disable tests on AzureLinux_x64_Cross_Mono #45276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #45263
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
